name: Focused Sands
desc:
Target creature must succeed on a Willpower saving throw or take 2d12 damage and lose 1 AP until the end of their next turn, as a part of their skin is rapidly aged and reverted painfully. If cast for 3 AP, a creature that succeeds on the saving throw takes half damage.

A creature can only lose AP from this spell once between each of its turns.
empower: Choose one: Damage increases to 3d12, or the spell targets a 5 foot radius sphere centered on the target.
author: CrusaderDroid
